news.title: Man, 76, arrested on suspicion of poisoning after children fall ill at summer camp
news.summary: Police say the man was detained after eight children reported feeling unwell.

news.title: Boost our pay or risk strike action, nurse leaders warn
news.summary: Royal College of Nursing wants urgent talks on way NHS contract works, warning nurses feel undervalued.

news.title: Passengers urged to check flights after disruption at UK airports
news.summary: Airlines are demanding answers after an air traffic control failure led to 150 flights being cancelled on Wednesday.

news.title: Jess Glynne calls White House deportation video with Jet2 song 'sick'
news.summary: The post was captioned: "When ICE books you a one-way Jet2 holiday to deportation. Nothing beats it!"

news.title: 'Endless battle': Fighting the crime gangs taking over the high street
news.summary: People say they're terrified of going to the shops, with reports of intimidation and open drug dealing.

news.title: Ofcom investigates 34 porn sites over age checks
news.summary: Ofcom said on Friday that more than 6,000 porn sites would begin verifying users, but it believes some are ignoring the new rules.

news.title: Number of new homes in England falls in Labour's first year - see how many were added in your area
news.summary: Find out how many new homes were registered where you live during Labourâ€™s first year in government

news.title: Man injured in Tommy Robinson station investigation leaves hospital
news.summary: Police are wanting to question far-right activist Tommy Robinson in connection with the incident on Monday.

news.title: Watch: Huge stick insect discovered in Australia
news.summary: A new "supersized" species of stick insect that is roughly as heavy as a golf ball has been discovered in Australia.

news.title: Lawyers warn Starmer recognising Palestinian state could break law
news.summary: Sir Keir Starmer says the UK will recognise a Palestinian state in September if conditions are not met.
